description: A simple overview of the most important Docker host and container metrics. (cAdvisor/Prometheus)

targets.expr: node_load1{instance=~"$IP:.*"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$IP:.*"}))
node_load1{instance=~"$IP:9100"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$IP:9100"}))

title: Docker monitoring
